attributes.action: The government must apologise for the GCHQ intrusion into the Guardian offices
attributes.additional_details:
Pre-censorship of our Free Press by shadowy figures from British "security services" is totally unacceptable to the Electorate.
Many suspect that intrusions such as the one reported at The Guardian reflect a submissive and servile attitude by our own "secret services" towards their American masters.
THIS MUST STOP IMMEDIATELY and Parliament should hold an open debate on what happened at The Guardian.
